activities:
CYREN uses personal information collected through our websites for: Marketing research and analysis; Help to better manage content on the website; Send customers marketing communications; Evaluate our website’ technical capability in order to improve it; Track website usage; Personalize a user's experience of our web site; Make it easier for users to complete forms on our web site; and to, Analyze user trends.   When using the investor portion on our www.cyren.com website, our service provider collects and uses personal information to:  Make navigation of our web site easier; Monitor website performance; and to, Provide requested investor relations documents.  The following personal information is collected on our websites:  Name, Company name, Email address, and Phone number. 
When using CYREN’s Web Security and Mail Security (“MYELEVEN”) platforms, CYREN collects the following personal information for use by our clients:   Name, Company name, Email address and Phone Number.    Also, when using CYREN’s Web Security and Mail Security products, CYREN may transfer personal information to companies (i.e., third parties) who help us provide our service.  
CYREN will retain personal information for as long as needed to provide services to our clients.  Also, CYREN will retain and use personal information as necessary to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data, Manually processed data, Human Resources data
recoursemech: For organization human resources data, EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC; for all other data TRUSTe.
